mapper.update:
update t_customer
CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_REPRESENTATIVE = #{legalRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_ONE = #{phoneOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_TWO = #{phoneTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEB_SITE = #{webSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_DATE = #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE},
NEXT_CONTACT_TIME = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TRACKING_CURVE = #{trackingCurve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BELONG_TO = #{belongTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROPERTIES = #{properties,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_NO = #{taxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT = #{credit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEGRAL = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_customer set CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_REPRESENTATIVE = #{legalRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_ONE = #{phoneOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_TWO = #{phoneTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEB_SITE = #{webSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_DATE = #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, NEXT_CONTACT_TIME = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TRACKING_CURVE = #{trackingCurve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BELONG_TO = #{belongTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROPERTIES = #{properties,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_NO = #{taxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDIT = #{credit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTEGRAL = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE} where CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
